name: Patagonia Atom Sling 8L - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Keep everything you need for the day within easy reach. Two compartments and an interior sleeve help keep things orderly, and external straps add carrying capacity so you can bring along your yoga mat or an extra layer. The teardrop shape fits against your upper back, keeping your profile sleek.Made of durable 630-denier nylon with 50% recycled content.Polyurethane coating and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish for excellent water resistance.Mesh-backed shoulder straps and back panel wick moisture and dry quickly.Large main compartment has an internal padded tablet sleeve.Front zippered pocket has a clip to keep your keys safe.Expandable shoulder strap pocket holds most phones.Compression straps let you lash on a yoga mat or jacket.
